entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 62
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 7 Photos from the special event 1988-0000 Demonstrating with a Brush, Pune, Maharashtra, India have been uploaded 6 days ago to Eternal Moments: 7 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1988.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
